name: Baguio City Tour
description: Explore the Summer Capital with Burnham Park, Mines View, and strawberry farms.

name: Tagaytay Day Trip
description: Scenic views of Taal Volcano, bulalo restaurants, and cool weather.

name: Palawan Adventure
description: Underground River tour and island hopping in El Nido.

name: Boracay Beach Getaway
description: White Beach paradise with water sports and nightlife.

name: Cebu Heritage Tour
description: Magellan's Cross, Oslob whale sharks, and lechon feast.

name: Siargao Surfing Trip
description: Cloud 9 surfing, island hopping, and laid-back vibes.

name: Vigan Heritage Walk
description: Spanish colonial architecture and Calle Crisologo experience.

name: Bohol Countryside Tour
description: Chocolate Hills, tarsiers, and Loboc River cruise.

name: Batanes Scenic Tour
description: Rolling hills, stone houses, and untouched natural beauty.

name: La Union Beach Trip
description: Surfing lessons, beach bars, and sunset views.

name: Davao City Escape
description: Philippine Eagle Center, durian tasting, and Samal Island.

name: Coron Island Hopping
description: Crystal-clear lagoons, WWII shipwrecks, and pristine beaches.
